summary: The diff partially implements the BuildRequest. REQ-1 (logo replacement) is fully implemented in Header.tsx with the correct image path and responsive sizing. REQ-2 (branding updates) is only partially implemented - the Header component shows 'neroxa ai' branding, but there is no evidence of updates to application title, meta tags, or PWA manifest as required by the acceptance criteria.

missing_requirements.requirement: The application title and meta tags reflect the new branding
missing_requirements.reason: No changes shown to frontend/index.html meta tags or title. The file is listed as modified in frontend-file-summaries.txt but the actual diff content is not provided, so cannot confirm if title/meta tags were updated from 'Vantior AI' to 'Neroxa AI'.

missing_requirements.requirement: The PWA manifest is updated with the new name
missing_requirements.reason: No changes shown to any PWA manifest file (e.g., manifest.json or manifest.webmanifest). No evidence of manifest updates in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: All text references to 'Vantior AI' are replaced with 'Neroxa AI'
missing_requirements.reason: Only Header.tsx shows the branding change. The frontend-file-summaries.txt references 'Hollow AI design system' in tailwind.config.js description, suggesting incomplete branding updates across the codebase. Without full file diffs, cannot verify all references were updated.
